channel.title: Projects on Not A Rocket Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Not A Rocket Scientist

item.title: Latex And Beamer Snippets
item.description: In 2012, when I was at the final stage of my PhD to write a thesis, I put “learning LaTeX” on my to-do list. Early 2021, I finally remove the item from the list. I read the Learn LaTeX in 30 minutes article from Overleaf, and then immediately started using it. When I encountered some problems along the way, I just Google them. This way of learning is not very systematic, but it does the job.
